TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DesignerNavigationDirection extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Specifies values for navigating among designer objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
Designer navigation directions are spatial, allowing you to indicate which direction navigation should occur on a workflow design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection Down = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Navigates down to the next activity in sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection Left = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Navigates to the left in the workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection Right = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Navigates to the right in the workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection Up = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Navigates up to the previous activity in sequence.
